idea-plugin.name: Base16 Harmonic16 Light
idea-plugin.vendor: Jannik Siebert (https://github.com/janniks), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Harmonic16 Light for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Jannik Siebert (https://github.com/janniks). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
